hgeGUI::EnableCtrl

Enables or disables a control. 

void EnableCtrl(
  int id,
  bool bEnabled
);

Parameters

id
The identificator of the control to be changed.
bVisible
If true the control will be enabled, otherwise the control will be disabled.

Requirements

Header: hgegui.h
Import library: hgehelp.lib

See also

MoveCtrl, ShowCtrl
